content.heading: ExamFactor - Carving your academic excellence the AI way!
content.description:
A young kid dreamt of excelling in his academic endeavors!

He joined a nearby tuition class but the learnings didn’t reflect in the assessments at school.

His parent now supplemented the tuition with an online tutorial platform, but still, couldn't understand where the lag was.

And this is where ExamFactor helps!

Powered by a robust AI-based test engine, ExamFactor promises to offer a personalized learning journey for every student to ensure their learning needs are met without any compromises!

getLearningApp.heading: Get the learning app
getLearningApp.content: Download lessons and learn anytime, anywhere with the ExamFactor app.

learningWithExamFactor.heading: Start learning with ExamFactor
learningWithExamFactor.content: Get unlimited access to structured assessments & practice assessments
